Shiro Kuriwaki
Cory McCartan

item.description: A new postscript analyzes the final version of the U.S. Census Bureau's Disclosure Avoidance System.

item.title: 2020 Redistricting Data Files
item.dc:creator: Christopher T. Kenny
Cory McCartan
item.description: Census and election data joined together for use in redistricting and voting rights analysis.

item.description: We are releasing an updated version of our analysis of the U.S. Census' privacy protection system and its impacts on the redistricting process.

item.description: The Data Stewardship Executive Policy Committee announces a higher privacy loss budget and other changes to the Disclosure Avoidance System.

item.title: Impact of the Census Disclosure Avoidance System on Redistricting
item.dc:creator: Christopher T. Kenny
Shiro Kuriwaki
Cory McCartan
Evan Rosenman
Tyler Simko
Kosuke Imai
item.description: In attempting to protect the privacy of 2020 Census respondents, the Census Bureau has made its data unsuitable for redistricting purposes.

item.title: redist 3.0
item.dc:creator: Cory McCartan
Christopher Kenny
item.description: A major release brings new algorithms, new workflows, and significant usability improvements.
